game_description: Take a time for yourself is essential to maintain a good balance in your professional and personal life. Natur'360 offers you a complete solution, an immersive bubble of escape, relaxation, meditation ... Choose the duration of your session and let yourself be guided on the chosen theme while traveling through 100% natural landscape only for you ! Kick back as you admire the Northern Lights, discover wonderful waterfalls, or fly over Mexico, unless you prefer to take a breath of fresh air in the mountains ... or choose from many other spectacular landscapes Enjoy a extraordinary and personalized experience, let yourself be taken away for a well-deserved break of rejuvenation and escape by putting all your problems behind you (stress, sleep, confidence, fatigueâ€¦) and reload your energy.
review_1: UPDATE: Able to see one free scene, others paid or zero price but locked. Still not my cup of tea. Uninstalled. --------------------------------- a lot of downloads, but nothing is accessible (content is locked), no demo, not working at all.. French only..
